action.action-desc: Mr. Buyer introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide certain veterans an opportunity to increase the amount of Veterans’ Group Life Insurance.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans’ Group Life Insurance Improvement Act of 2009.

section.header: Increased amount of veterans’ group life insurance
section.text: Section 1977(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting Except as provided in paragraph (3), before Veterans’ Group Life Insurance shall be; and
by adding after paragraph (2) the following new paragraph:

subsection.text: Not more than once in each five-year period beginning on the date a person becomes insured under Veterans’ Group Life Insurance, such person may elect in writing to increase the amount for which the person is insured if—

paragraph.text: the person is under the age of 60;
the increased amount is not more than $25,000; and
the amount for which the person is insured does not exceed the amount provided for under section 1967(a)(3)(A)(i) of this title.
